resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

nealrichardson commented on pull request #6108: ARROW-7479: [rust][ruby][r] fix typos
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6108#discussion_r362093952
 
 

 ##########
 File path: r/man/read_delim_arrow.Rd
 ##########
 @@ -109,7 +109,7 @@ parsing options provided in other arguments (e.g. \code{delim}, \code{quote}, et
 \link[=Table]{arrow::Table}?}
 }
 \value{
-A \code{data.frame}, or an Table if \code{as_data_frame = FALSE}.
+A \code{data.frame}, or a Table if \code{as_data_frame = FALSE}.
 
 Review comment:
   This is a generated file, so you should fix the source too: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/R/csv.R#L70

 ##########
 File path: rust/arrow/src/ipc/file/reader.rs
 ##########

     make_array(array_data)
 }
 
-/// Reads the correct number of buffers based on list type an null_count, and creates a
+/// Reads the correct number of buffers based on list type a null_count, and creates a
 
 Review comment:
   I think this should be `and` instead of `a`.  i.e. `... based on list type and null_count`.
